Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: அவாஎன்ப எல்லா உயிர்க்கும் எஞ்ஞான்றும் தவாஅப் பிறப்பீனும் வித்து.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: The wise declare, through all the days, to every living thing, That ceaseless round of birth from seed of strong desire doth spring.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A single, pulsating seed of dark energy, representing Desire ('அவா'), lies on barren cosmic ground.
Layered_Composition.Midground: From this seed, a colossal, gnarled Banyan tree grows. Its roots are shadowy tendrils of desire, and its trunk is composed of countless, intertwined ghostly figures representing the cycle of rebirth.
Layered_Composition.Background: The tree's vast branches spread into a cosmic canopy where each leaf is a miniature, repeating universe, symbolizing the endless cycle of birth ('பிறப்பீனும் வித்து').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The concept of Desire visualized as the primordial seed from which the endless, sorrowful cycle of birth and rebirth emanates across the cosmos.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The tree's roots are depicted as chains of attachment. The leaves as repeating worlds highlight the inescapable nature of the cycle fueled by desire.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A dark, unsettling purple and crimson light emanates from the seed of desire. The tree and its roots are in deep, shadowy tones, contrasted against a vast, star-filled cosmic background of deep blues and blacks.

Technical_Cues.Camera: Ultra-wide cosmic shot, low angle, emphasizing the scale of the tree of rebirth.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, hyper-realistic, with ethereal and mystical effects.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Volumetric lighting from the seed, creating a sinister glow. Nebulae in the background provide soft, ambient light.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Symbolic art meets cosmic fantasy, digital matte painting.

Negative_Prompt: bright sunny day, happy figures, simple tree, text artifacts, low-resolution, cartoony, oversaturated.
